title: Why the long face? Horses remember human emotions - scientists
text:
Why the long face? Horses remember human emotions - scientists Thursday, May 10, 2018 - 01:50
Horses can recognise whether you are happy or angry and remember that emotion hours later, according to animal behaviour researchers in the UK, as Stuart McDill reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Horses can recognise whether you are happy or angry and remember that emotion hours later, according to animal behaviour researchers in the UK, as Stuart McDill reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2G4vGx7
